title: 'Troll moniter'
body: Ran into another troll tahm, throw you to enemy, taking buffs/monsters, blah blah. If Rito can't do shit to nerf champion's troll potential , the least you can do is let people know when the troll is in town. Since no one likes my 'dislike button' idea, it would be great if there is a way to track if a player(that is not in your friend list) is in queue or not.

replies.body: You can right click to get out of his mouth. And he cant eat buff monsters
You actually get to choose which direction you come out of his mouth also, so if you're quick you can go the other way.
Or you could just wait a few minutes.
